| HistoryText             = [[Clark Savage, Jr. (Earth-616)|Doc Savage]] was accompanied on his adventures by his five friends dubbed the "The Fabulous Five", all highly accomplished individuals in their own right. This included Lieutenant [[Andrew Blodgett Mayfair (Earth-616)|Colonel Andrew Blodgett "Monk" Mayfair]], an industrial chemist, [[Theodore Marley Brooks (Earth-616)|Brigadier General Theodore Marley "Ham" Brooks]], an accomplished attorney. [[John Renwick (Earth-616)|Colonel John "Renny" Renwick]], a construction engineer, [[Thomas J. Roberts (Earth-616)|Major Thomas J. "Long Tom" Roberts]], an electrical engineer and finally [[William Harper Littlejohn (Earth-616)|William Harper "Johnny" Littlejohn]], an archaeologist and geologist.{{r|Doc Savage Vol 1 1}}
